programme.title: Cooley High
programme.desc: Chicago, 1964: Two teens navigate the end of high school in this authentic portrait of Black youth.

programme.title: Coffy
programme.desc: A tough vigilante (Pam Grier) seeks revenge, using her wits to clean up the streets after her sister's death.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: A policeman learns that the CIA saved a deranged killer from execution to use as a government assassin.

programme.title: Never 2 Big
programme.desc: A music industry executive tries to uncover the truth behind a singer's murder.

programme.title: In The Mix
programme.desc: A DJ rescues a mobster one night and as a thank you, the mobster tasks the DJ with protecting his daughter.

programme.title: Breaking Brooklyn
programme.desc: A young boy with a passion for dance and his older brother are rescued from the streets.

programme.title: The Ride
programme.desc: The inspiring story of a BMX champion who overcame an abusive childhood. Starring Ludacris.

programme.title: Caught Up
programme.desc: Poor choices and bad luck land a Los Angelean in prison and in other scrapes with a new girlfriend.

programme.title: Phat Beach
programme.desc: A teen pulls an aspiring-writer pal into his plan to sell cheap sunglasses to California beachgoers.

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: Determined not to forget his roots, a future NBA star throws a cookout in his new neighborhood.
